publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1390 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Office of the Clerk-That the Parliament agrees that between 8 January 2005 and 2 September 2005, the Office of the Clerk shall be open all days except: Saturdays and Sundays, 25 and 28 March, and 2, 27 and 30 May 2005. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
